item.title: 2020 Tokyo Olympics Ranking
item.description: Weighted sum is calculated as \(3 \cdot gold + 2 \cdot silver + 1 \cdot bronze\). The number of athletes per country at the Tokyo Olympics sourced from Business Insider. Medal standings fetched from olympics.com. Raw data at . Medal count last updated at .
